Expense - Class in ct326A1
The Expense class represents an employee's expense claim.

ExpenseCategory - Enum Class in ct326A1
Enum representing different categories of expenses.
ExpensePrinter - Interface in ct326A1
The ExpensePrinter interface defines a method for printing a list of expenses.
ExpensesPortal - Class in ct326A1
The ExpensesPortal class maintains a list of expenses and provides methods for submitting, printing, and calculating total expenses.
ExpensesPortal() - Constructor for class ct326A1.ExpensesPortal
Constructs an ExpensesPortal with an empty list of expenses.
